TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Check if source row exist in target table a) if present then compare the column values of source and target. If there is a difference then set CHANGE_FLAG = 1 to denote it as changed record else CHANGE_FLAG = 0 b) If not present then set NEW_FLAG=1 to denote as new record.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Exp_Detect_Changes

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(NOT ISNULL(Tgt_PYAP_ID) AND NOT ISNULL(Tgt_CORP_OWNR_ID) AND ( Tgt_PYAP_PYMT_ID!=Src_PYAP_PYMT_ID or Tgt_PYAP_VNDR_ID!=Src_PYAP_VNDR_ID or RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_CMPNY_CD)) != RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_CMPNY_CD)) or Tgt_PYAP_BUS_ENTY!=var_PYAP_BUS_ENTY or RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_MODL_TYP_CD)) != RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_MODL_TYP_CD)) or RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_PRD_ID)) != RTRIM(LTRIM(var_PYAP_PRD_ID)) or IIF(ISNULL(RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_CMNT_TX))),'NA',RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_CMNT_TX)))!= IIF(ISNULL(RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_CMNT_TX))),'NA',RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_CMNT_TX))) or Tgt_PYAP_DOC_TYP_CD!=Src_PYAP_DOC_TYP_CD or RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_GL_ACCT_ID)) != RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_GL_ACCT_ID)) or Tgt_PYAP_PYMT_TYP_CD!=Src_PYAP_PYMT_TYP_CD or Tgt_PYAP_RVNUE_TYP_CD!=Src_PYAP_RVNUE_TYP_CD or RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_ARS_ACCT_ID)) != RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_ARS_ACCT_ID)) or RTRIM(LTRIM(Tgt_PYAP_PYAP_TYP_CD)) != RTRIM(LTRIM(Src_PYAP_PYAP_TYP_CD)) or Tgt_PYAP_AT!=Src_PYAP_AT or Tgt_PYAP_CRTE_DT!=var_PYAP_CRTE_DT or Tgt_PYAP_CRTE_USR_ID!=var_PYAP_CRTE_USR_ID), 1, 0 )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: Changed_Flag

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup target table "TPAYMENT_APPL" to check the existance of source record.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Lkp_TPAYMENT_APPL

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Extract records for timestamp>'$$LOAD_LAST_TS'. Initial value of parameter $$LOAD_LAST_TS is '1111-01-01 00:00:00.000000' and is get updated with UPDT_TS value.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_source_records

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Route input records to two outputs - New and Changed, based on New and Changed flags. When New Flag =1then record is inserted into the target TRBI table "GDXDM.TPAYMENT_APPL". When Changed Flag= 1then record is updated into the target TRBI table "GDXDM.TPAYMENT_APPL".
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Rtr_New_Changed_Rows

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Check if source row exist in target table a) if present then compare the column values of source and target. If there is a difference then set CHANGE_FLAG = 1 to denote it as changed record else CHANGE_FLAG = 0 b) If not present then set NEW_FLAG=1 to denote as new record.
INSTANCE.NAME: Exp_Detect_Changes

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Lookup target table "TPAYMENT_APPL" to check the existance of source record.
INSTANCE.NAME: Lkp_TPAYMENT_APPL

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Extract records for timestamp>'$$LOAD_LAST_TS'. Initial value of parameter $$LOAD_LAST_TS is '1111-01-01 00:00:00.000000' and is get updated with UPDT_TS value.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_source_records

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Route input records to two outputs - New and Changed, based on New and Changed flags. When New Flag =1then record is inserted into the target TRBI table "GDXDM.TPAYMENT_APPL". When Changed Flag= 1then record is updated into the target TRBI table "GDXDM.TPAYMENT_APPL".
INSTANCE.NAME: Rtr_New_Changed_Rows
